categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Locke was a Chagrian male Jedi Master of the Jedi Order. During the Cold War he was stationed on Carrick Station.
Locke appears in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic. He was originally going to serve as a Jedi Knight trainer but the content was cut. Locke's file can be found on Jedipedia.
